title: Il segno del comando
text: Il segno del comando (i.e. "The sign of the command") is a 1971 Italian <a href="giallo">giallo</a>-<a href="Fantasy%20film">fantasy</a> <a href="television%20miniseries">television miniseries</a> directed by <a href="Daniele%20D%27Anza">Daniele D'Anza</a> and starring <a href="Ugo%20Pagliai">Ugo Pagliai</a>, <a href="Carla%20Gravina">Carla Gravina</a> and <a href="Massimo%20Girotti">Massimo Girotti</a>. It was broadcast on <a href="Rai%201">Programma Nazionale</a>. It was remade in 1992 by <a href="Giulio%20Questi">Giulio Questi</a>.
